issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: AliyunOSSInputStream#read() should update read bytes stat correctly

comments.body:
I reviewed (sorry for coming late) other places that update the file system statistics; they look good to me.

Ping [~uncleGen], [~stevel@apache.org] and [~drankye] for comments.
Thanks [~liuml07] for the reporting. The patch LGTM and +1. Will convert it to a HADOOP one.
